author: Jasmine Wright and Edward-Isaac Dovere, CNN
title: Vice President Harris interviewed Supreme Court finalists, according to White House official
description: Vice President Kamala Harris interviewed President Joe Biden's three final candidates for his Supreme Court nomination, a White House official told CNN.
content:
(CNN)Vice President Kamala Harris interviewed President Joe Biden's three final candidates for his Supreme Court nomination, a White House official told CNN.
